title: Scammed by another player.
body:
Hi. I thought I'd post in here to see if i could try and get it reversed but i was just scammed by another League player. 

We added each other after a game and sort of because online friends, playing games together. I have done this quite a few times before with other people with no dramas, most league players are honest people. 

He asked if we could trade mystery gifts with one another, he asked for a champion and said he would trade either a champion gift or skin gift which ever one i had wanted. I had done this before with new players i had played with online with absolutely no troubles. You obviously had to wait 2 weeks of being a friend on league to trade gifts but when he asked today and i did, he deleted and possibly blocked me from league right after. 

I was just wondering i could get the gift reversed or at the very least taken off him. His name was EatSomeTimTam.

replies.body: You got scammed. And it's entirely your fault. I'm very sorry for your loss; take this as a lesson. Don't trust anyone on the internet.
You should do the opposite of trust him.
